Description: Two unperforated blue glass discs, possibly gaming counters; both have convex tops - one with a moulded rim - and roughly flat undersides; surfaces chipped and showing traces of iridescence.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus (probably)
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p. 125, Tomb 244)
